text: Mihajlo Biberčić (born 23 September 1968) is a retired Serbian football striker.Weltfussball He represented Yugoslavia U-16 in 3 games having scored once in 1985.Mihajlo Bibercic at 11v11.com ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Serbian footballers Category:FK Radnički 1923 players Category:FK Borac Čačak players Category:FC Prishtina players Category:Íþróttabandalag Akraness players Category:Knattspyrnufélag Reykjavíkur players Category:Breiðablik UBK players Category:Stjarnan players Category:Association football forwards Category:Serbian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Iceland Category:Serbian expatriate sportspeople in Iceland
title: Mihajlo Biberčić
